```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r car-plot}
mtcars %>%
select(mpg, wt) %>%
ggplot(mapping = aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
geom_point() +
geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ x, se = FALSE) +
theme_clean() +
labs(title = "Relationship between Weight and MPG in Cars",
     subtitle = "As weight goes down, so does MPG",
     x = "Weight",
     y = "Miles Per Gallon",
     caption = "Henderson and Vellerman (1981)")
```
